Class Point

  • java.lang.Object
    • exploration.paretoExploration.gridexploration.Point

  • public class Point
extends java.lang.Object
    A point in the multi-dimensional space.
    Author:
    Pranav Tendulkar

        Returns:

      • minus

        Point minus(Point p)
        Subtract this point with another point p and return a Point with new co-ordinates. We return (this - p). This object remains unchanged.
        Parameters:
        p - point to be subtracted from the current
        Returns:
        new Point with subtracted value to each dimension

      • minus

        Parameters:

        Returns:

        Point multiply(Point p)
        Multiply this point with another point and return a new point. This object remains unchanged.
        Parameters:
        p - another Point p.
        Returns:
        new Point with co-ordinates as (this.co-ord * p.co-ord)
